(inner) _braodcastGlobal(params, next, done, xyz)

Source:
  • src/Service/Middleware/service.broadcast.global.js, line 4

will broadcast a message regardless of the path to all nodes.

(inner) _braodcastLocal(params, next, done, xyz)

Source:
  • src/Service/Middleware/service.broadcast.local.js, line 5

will ignore the service path enitrely and will send the message to every known host in localhost. Note that this module does not resolve path addresses

(inner) _firstFind(params, next, done, xyz)

Source:
  • src/Service/Middleware/service.first.find.js, line 5

Will resolve the service path to an array of nodes that can responde to the target path given. It will then send the message to first node in the array.

Source:
  • src/Service/Middleware/service.send.to.all.js, line 5

Will resolve the service path to an array of nodes that can responde to the target path given. It will then send the message to all of the node in the array.

(inner) _sendToTarget(_target)

Source:
  • src/Service/Middleware/service.sent.to.target.js, line 3

Will send a message to exactly one node .

Example
`ms.call({... , sendStrategy: sendToTaget('192.168.0.0:5000')}, () => {})`
Parameters:
Name Type Description
_target String

target node netId
